data.title: Mumbai: Actor Sumeet Raghavan's wife helps cops nab pervert masturbating in car
data.text:
Yet another case of masturbation has come to light just two days after the Delhi Police announced a reward for information of the man who was caught masturbating in a crowded bus

Sumeet Raghvan and Chinmayi

ADVERTISEMENT

Yet another case of masturbation has come to light just two days after the Delhi Police announced a reward for information of the man who was caught masturbating in a crowded bus. This time, the incident happened in Mumbai.

On Monday afternoon, wife of actor Sumit Raghavan, Chinmayee, filed a complaint in Vile Parle police station against an unknown driver, who was masturbating in a car near her residence. The incident left the actor totally perplexed and through social media he shared the details of the incident, wherein he wrote the last four digits of the car, and an identity of the man.

Also Read: Mumbai Crime: Woman Nabs Masturbating Pervert At Marine Drive

Sumeet tweeted, 'A white BMW with last 4 digits 1985 needs to be traced. The driver wearing a grey safari who had parked near #ParleTilakSchool #VileParleEast started masturbating in front of my wife. Before she could slap him he escaped. She could note down just the last 4 digits@MumbaiPolice'.

Taking immediate action on the FIR lodged by Sumeet's wife, Mumbai police arrested the accused with the help of the CCTV Footage.

In late January, a 34-year-old woman nabbed a masturbating pervert at the Marine Drive promenade. He was arrested by the police.
